com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver

Class MixedNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver.AlgebraicParticle
      • com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver.MixedNumber

  • public class MixedNumber
extends AlgebraicParticle
    Holds a fraction and integer value, which can be used as an exponent.
    Author:
    Nateowami

        public boolean isSimplified()
